Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzSearchDBThread::DzSearchDBThread (  ) 

Constructor. Creates a new thread for searching the content database

Destructor

Member Function Documentation

void DzSearchDBThread::run (  )  [virtual]

Attempts to start and run this thread. If the database has not been set this method has no effect. If the search container has not been set this method has no effect. It the chunk size has not been set then this method has no effect.

See also:
setDB()
setChunkingSize()
setContainer()
void DzSearchDBThread::setContainer ( DzSearchContainerPtr  con  ) 

Sets the container for this search thread.

Parameters:
con The container for this thread to put results in
void DzSearchDBThread::setDB ( IDzObjectDatabase *  db  ) 

Sets the database to be used in the search

Parameters:
db The database to search
void DzSearchDBThread::setFinishObject ( QObject *  obj  ) 

Sets the object to be used as a callback when the search has finished.

Parameters:
obj The object to be used when the search is finished. It must have a slot called finishSearch().
void DzSearchDBThread::setProgressObject ( QObject *  obj  ) 

Sets the object to be used as a callback for displaying progress

Parameters:
obj The object to be used for displaying progress. It must have two slots in order for this to work: setRange(int, int) and setValue(int)
void DzSearchDBThread::stopSearch (  ) 

Stops the current search
